amendment.description: Amendment reduces the budget for the Botanic Garden by $1,235,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-518 to reduce the budget for the Botanic Garden by $1,235,000 for Fiscal Year 2013, so that it is appropriated resources at 2009 levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 213 - 193 (Roll no. 371).
